name: OPPO
description: OPPO phones are known for their innovative features, including immersive displays, long-lasting batteries, and powerful processors. OPPO phones are available in a range of price points, from budget-friendly to high-end.

name: Xiaomi Redmi 13C
description: Redmi 13C delivers smooth and stable performance thanks to the reliable MediaTek Helio G85, an octa-core processor that balances power and efficiency.

name: Samsung Galaxy
description: Minix watches are exclusively designed to fulfill the advanced tech needs of today’s generation.

name: Google pixel
description: Pixel 7 offers innovative and helpful features for your photos and calls. Boasting features such as Photo Unblur and Clear Calling, Google Pixel just keeps getting better.

name: iphone 16pro
description: The iPhone 16 stands out with its A18 Bionic chip, ProMotion display, and advanced AI-powered camera system, offering superior performance, exceptional visuals, and professional-grade photography.

name: OnePlus Nord CE4
description: OnePlus models are unlocked Android smartphones with quad-core Snapdragon CPUs and up to 8GB RAM that initially ran the Cyanogen version of Android

name: Huawei
description: Huawei phones often have large, vibrant displays with a wide color gamut. For example, the HUAWEI X-True™ Display has TÜV Rheinland Colour Accuracy Dual Certification and five-star glass drop resistance certification.

name: Vivo
description: Vivo smartphones offer include: Camera technology: Vivo smartphones are known for their powerful camera systems, which often include multiple lenses with high resolution and low light performance.

name: Nokia
description: Nokia A200 is a QWERTY featurephone, with dual-SIM capability and Easy Swap, enabling the user to change SIM cards without having to turn off the device.
